content: Van Etten Lake near Wurtsmith Air Force Base, outside of Oscoda, Michigan. The base is one of at least 55 military bases where drinking water is polluted with “forever chemicals” linked to cancers, immune suppression and serious health problems. “The lake now froths with toxic foam”—NYT, Feb 22, 2019__no.0212, 2019. #watercontamination #waterpollution #foreverchemicals
